titleInfo.title: USA v. Cruz-Guzman et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER granting 39 Motion to Withdraw as Attorney as to Luis Jacola-Echeverria. Jeffrey L. Thomas shall be deemed withdrawn as attorney of record and shall forthwith provide Glenn A. Shapiro with the discovery materials provided the defendant by the government and such other materials obtained by Mr. Thomas which are material to the defendant's defense. Ordered by Magistrate Judge F. A. Gossett.(MLF, )

titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER granting 43 Motion To Expand Time to File Pre-Trial Motions as to Francisco Javier Cruz-Guzman. Pretrial motions shall be filed on or before February 6, 2007. Gossett.(MLF, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Cruz-Guzman et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER as to defendant Francisco Javier Cruz-Guzman. The case is removed from the trial docket based upon the request of the defendant. A Change of Plea Hearing is set for 4/10/2007 at 3:00 PM before Magistrate Judge F. A. Gossett. Te time between 3/19/07 and the hearing on the anticipated plea of guilty is excluded for purposes of computing the limits under the Speedy Trial Act. Ordered by Magistrate Judge F. A. Gossett.(MLF, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Cruz-Guzman et al
titleInfo.subTitle: REPORT AND RECOMMENDATION that MOTION to Suppress47 be denied without prejudice, as to defendant Francisco Javier Cruz-Guzman. A party may object to this Report and Recommendation by filing a "Statement of Objection to Magistrate Judge's Recommendation" within 10 business days after being served with the recommendation. Ordered by Magistrate Judge F. A. Gossett. (JAE, )
